channel.title: CVE Feed for Squirrel -- Installers generated by Squirrel.Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Squirrel -- Installers generated by Squirrel.Windows

item.title: CVE-2022-46330|2024-08-03T14:31:46.282Z -- squirrel -- installers%20generated%20by%20squirrel.windows
item.description: Squirrel.Windows is both a toolset and a library that provides installation and update functionality for Windows desktop applications. Installers generated by Squirrel.Windows 2.0.1 and earlier contain an issue with the DLL search path, which may lead to insecurely loading Dynamic Link Libraries. As a result, arbitrary code may be executed with the privilege of the user invoking the installer.
